According to…           Seven UIC Faculty Members - 40 Under 40 Chicago Scientists    Posted on July 24, 2019    July 23, 2019 – Halocures.com just announced the 40 under 40 Chicago scientists who are changing the world through innovative technologies that earned them the title of “Heroes of Medicine.” Help…           Actuate Therapeutics in the News    Posted on June 17, 2019    Actuate (formerly Apotheca) Therapeutics, a private biopharmaceutical company founded in Chicago as a UIC and Northwestern spinout in 2015, achieved a major milestone recently by completing a $21.7 Million Series B…           West Loop Innovations to foster development of new therapeutics from UIC    Posted on April 29, 2019    The University of Illinois at Chicago (UIC) and Deerfield Management have partnered to establish West Loop Innovations, LLC. The company will help accelerate the commercialization of therapeutics developed at UIC.
